XmlBonusFileInterface Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for XmlBonusFileInterface:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class used to manage the content of a BonusFile

A BonusFile contains several Choices. Each choice has a name and a description. A choice contains a list of AttributeModifier that is a pair of Attribute/Modifier.

See also:
XmlBonusFileListInterface

XmlBonusFileInterface::getModByName ( $  choiceNode,
$  mod 
)

Get a modifer by its name

A choice contains a list of AttributeModifier. As an AttributeModifier contains a name and a modifier, this function return an AttributeModifier by its name.

Parameters:
$choiceNode A Choice XML node
$mod The name of the attribute to modify
Returns:
The AttributeModifier XML node or null if not found

true if successfull or false if the operation is failed
